updates.text: I wish I talked more. Maybe then I'd have a thousand people on my side.
I'm scared because I learned that waiting, attachment, or uncertainty used to hurt.
You'll change your name or change your mind, And leave this fucked up place behind. But I'll know.

今夜は祝福のはず
Tonight is supposed to be a blessing.
だがなぜ迷いと苦痛しかない
But why is there only confusion and pain?
たとえ、真実は天外に閉じ込められようと 我が家を失うことはない
Even if the truth is locked beyond the heavens, I will not lose my home.

I’m not losing my mind — I’m just going through a period where I’m unwell and overwhelmed. It might not be obvious right now, but if you give me time and stay, you’ll see that this isn’t all I am. There’s more to me than what shows on the surface.

I am the quiet one. The one who listens to others conversations while thinking to himself. Why is it so hard to be one of them? Why is it so goddamn hard to like the same things as them? why are you the Peace of a puzzle that doesn't fit. Why the hell are you like this? They don't understand me. I don't understand them. So I just ask what do I need to change about myself? What do I need to do to be just a little less miserable? Heart aches as I open my mouth. Fear that comes to my mind, the voices that shoutings, you're not enough. So I just stop and get back to where I was. Because as you know, I am the quiet one.
People online don't understand how fragile someone can be behind the screen. They react impulsively. Carelessly.
What kind of demon are you?.
